description: Applied automatically when customer received Pewist (loan) service and did not recharge.
Applied automatically when a customer typically recharges on the same day their service ends.
Applied automatically when a customer typically recharges within the first week after their service ends.
Applied automatically when a customer typically waits between one week and one month to recharge after service ends.
Applied automatically when a customer typically waits more than 30 days to recharge after service ends.
Applied automatically when customer only recharged during school holidays (May 25 - Sep 15)
Applied automatically when a customer has at least 12 successful recharges within the last 12 months.
Manually applied to very important customers.
Manually applied to customers who opted out of communications.
